metadata.title: CVE-2023-49606 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: A use-after-free vulnerability exists in the HTTP Connection Headersparsing in Tinyproxy 1.11.1 and Tinyproxy 1.10.0. A specially crafted HTTPheader can trigger reuse of previously freed memory, which leads to memorycorruption and could lead to remote code execution. An attacker needs tomake an unauthenticated HTTP request to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: tinyproxy package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
